solution.text: A hexagonal prism consists of 2 hexagons  connected to each other through their vertices.Also as a hexagon has 6 sides, a hexagonal prism will have 2 x 6 sides, and 6 more edges which connect the 2 hexagons together.Thus edges= 6+(2 x 6)=18

content.text: How many edges does a hexagonal prism have ?
